channel.title: Pk-Reality Release || Fatalscape Based AKA Exile || Loads of Content || moved on
channel.description: ** NOTE I AM PILDURASS ON RUNE-SERVER AND RUNELOCUS! Title says the server alias, base, and why im releasing this server. It really is hard for me to give out this source as it has so much work put into it it's unreal... I've spent 3 months of my blood, sweat, and tears on this server and i hope this helps you guys widen your knowledge in java and helps you embetter content on your server using mine. Well there aren't many pictures and they don't say much but here are pictures just so you see a few things: [img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/9734/assaultshopo.png[/img] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8797/voteshop.png[/img] [img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/2433/eliteclue.png[/img] [img]http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/4329/korasispec.png[/img] [img]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/6894/mithrilseeds.png[/img] [img]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/9311/pkpshopf.png[/img] and for features: - Click 2 Edit Stats (combat) - - Perfect Switching - - Player Owned Shops - - Never Before Seen Clue Scroll System - - Achievement System that interest players in all aspects of the server - - Killstreaks which give rewards and increased pk points - - Pvp drops (statuettes) that can give up to 250 pk points! - - Perfect Duel Arena with 0 dupes! - - Custom Assault minigame where you get defenders and void - - new firecape and completionist cape - - Rapidly growing community compete against great bridders and pkers - - Daily Server events hosted by staff and owner - - Over 40 achievements done - - Unique Never Before Seen player titles system - - Highscores to compete for the number 1 spot - - Auto-Donations that give donators their benefits and items automatically - - Non-Cheatable Voting system with amazing rewards - - Great bossing with over 15 main bosses giving amazing rewards - - Perfect slayer system having players search all over the map to kill monsters - - Fully coded nex with amazing rewards - - Over 150 Players registered on forums - - Perfectly coded specials for all items - - Awesome pk, slayer, donator, and vote shops with awesome items! - - Great economy MONEY IS ACTUALLY WORTH SOMETHING! - - SERVER IS 100% ONLINE ONLY DOWN FOR UPDATES - - ALL SKILLS WORKING - - REGULAR CONTENT UPDATES - Really what i want you guys to take out of this server is the combat system, i spent countless hours fixing maging and maging. Melee is good but I didn't work as long upon it as mage and range. Also i highlight, mac + isp banning, achievements, hard to cheat pkp system, and much more. Skills weren't worked upon so dont comment on how bad or non-complete some of them are. There is a lot fixed up from the original source and i bet you will not find a client + source like this anywhere else. Most importantly enjoy! I'm currently working on a matrix server, if you wish to contact me go to my forums at [url=http://www.pkreality.tk]www.pkreality.tk[/url] and pm me, or pm me here as i check here from time to time. Source Download: [url=http://uppit.com/24ucducmvs65/New_614_PKR_SOURCE_HERE.rar]http://uppit.com/24ucducmvs65/New_614_PKR_SOURCE_HERE.rar[/url] Client Download: [url=http://www.sendspace.com/file/828xft]http://www.sendspace.com/file/828xft[/url] Cache Download: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/55202225/pkrcache.zip]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/55202225/pkrcache.zip[/url] IF YOU HAVE ISSUES WITH ANY OF THESE DOWNLOAD LINKS POST HERE AND I WILL UPLOAD MIRRORS I GIVE 0 PERMISSION FOR THIS TO BE RELEASED ANYWHERE ELSE

item.title: Pk-Reality Release || Fatalscape Based AKA Exile || Loads of Content || moved on
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“BubNBong, post:27, topic:456283”]When I try to run the client it says

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Any help? [/quote]

In the Batch file, before “Jframe”, add “-cp .;”.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @defer48 defer48
item.description:
@defer48 wrote:

[quote=“Sessy Pk3r, post:34, topic:456283”][quote author=defer48 link=topic=559221.msg4090675#msg4090675 date=1346299093]
looks nice but wtf took you 3 months? Nothing looks to that spectacular, correct me if i’m wrong.
[/quote]
look at isp + mac banning, achievements, lots of minor fixes to the original source (download fatalscape and run it and you’ll see), perfect anti-cheating pkp system, clue scrolls (not regularly seen this kind on a server), bunches of other stuff that you’ll just see when u dl the source and run it lol. All the stuff that it talks about thats in the server is really not doing it any justice because thats straight from the advertisement section that I didn’t edit whatsoever.[/quote]
ok thank you.

Read full topic
